import Link from "next/link"; import DateMonth from "../../components/date/date"; import Repository from "../../components/resultSearch/respository"; import Error from "../../components/error/error"; import { getUser, getUserRepos } from "../../../actions"; const User = (props) => { const { user, repos } = props; const subject = "NextHub"; const message = "Hello!%0D%0A%0D%0ASaw%20your%20email%20on%20NextHub,%20and%20wanted%20to%20talk%20to%20you.%0D%0A%0D%0AThanks."; const emailLink = `mailto:${user.email}?subject=${subject}&body=${message}`; if (user.login) { return (

{user.name}

{user.login}
{user.bio}
{user.blog} {user.twitter_username} {user.company} {user.location} {user.email && (

Reach me on: {user.email}

)} {user.followers} followers {user.following} following {user.public_gists} gists {`Created on `}

{user.public_repos} public repositories

{repos && repos.map((repo) => )}
); } else { return ; } }; User.getInitialProps = async ({ query }) => { const user = await getUser(query.user); const repos = await getUserRepos(query.user); return { user, repos }; }; export default User;
